::KitKat2/StarScream/DrillBit::

KitKat and StarScream walk up to where DrillBit and Killfest are.
"Hey, whats going on?" Asks KitKat.

"We were getting some equipment to help gather information for
extracting DarkFate. But Shivia left, that SilverScout is lose. Speaking
of that..." DrillBit opened a comm to Shivia.
"This is DrillBit, whats the situation?"
